__e: Tomorrow approaches with haste, and I do need my rest. Of course, my lady.
And I will not live it wondering if tomorrow is the day your nightmare finally takes her away for good.
Now, tomorrow will be for me the first step in what stands to be the most important chapter of my life.
Our wounds run deep, and I know many of you are afraid of what threats tomorrow may bring.
What's here today is gone tomorrow and tomorrow brings a whole new journey.
But neither of us knows what tomorrow is.
